agent_utterance: Nice work sticking with a small, mindful plan. Try this micro-step now: after you log your intended small portion, take two slow breaths and have a glass of water before you start eating. Eat slowly for a short, defined window and pause after a few bites to check in on fullness. If cravings pop up, pause for two deep breaths and another sip of water before continuing. After the meal, log what you ate and how full you feel to reinforce structure and progress toward your goal.
